column5: Looking for good spring spot for a good getaway and walleye fishing. Also looking for a Misc. large northern. looking for a good spot more south than north. Any suggestions?????ph1shdude
Dude - stay away from Georgian Bay - the fishing has been horrible - plenty of other places

Any suggestions? Trying to stay north on 400/11. Bringing our own boat. That seems to be within driving distance for me. I have been as far as Temagami and Somewhere north of sudbury. What about nippising??thanks phishdude

I have to second "FUZZY". Went there this year and got skunked and we fished it HARD! Other friends went this year too, different places north and south and: same-o-same-o! We were fishing out of Pointe Au Baril.The French has been suffering for YEARS!! Where to suggest going? I haven't a clue except for Wisconsin, Minnesota or Erie - honest! We fished the St. Lawrence the previous two years - skunked!Sorry, I wish I could point you in the right direction for Canada.RANGER
